item.title: Weather Station v1.0.5
item.description: A small patch for Weather Station to fix some issues while offline.

item.title: Weather Station v1.1.0
item.description: A major update for Weather Station to overhaul various parts of the code, deprecate some references for privacy concerns, add a thumbnail, and add some new options for formatting the date and time.

item.title: GroupDigits function
item.description: Release of a new function: GroupDigits. This function takes an integer or real number and outputs it as a string with commas as thousands separators.

item.title: Doodle Daydreams v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new ghost: Doodle Daydreams. A poseable doll to dress up and daydream with. What worlds will your mind take you to...?

item.title: Ye Olde Cursed Tower v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new ghost: Ye Olde Cursed Tower. An evil wizard sits atop a tower, collecting souls... for what purpose? Nobody is sure. What will happen to the people trapped within the tower's walls? ... Well, that's up to you, since you are that wizard! Have fun.

item.title: Ye Olde Soul Spell v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new balloon: Ye Olde Soul Spell. A spell themed balloon with a variety of colors and a few patterns. It's also round!

item.title: Doodle Daydreams v1.0.1
item.description: A small patch for Doodle Daydreams to iron out the jam jank.

item.title: Hoard of Shinies v1.0.6
item.description: A small update with some additional settings for Hoard of Shinies.

item.title: Permissions page now available
item.description: A new page has been added to the website, detailing permissions for how my various different works should be handled.

item.title: Aughost 2025 announcement
item.description: Aughost 2025 will be happening soon! See the event's page for the guidelines.

item.title: Xander's Refuge v1.0.4
item.description: A small update to Xander's Refuge (both the original version and the Aosora port) with some minor changes and code cleanup.

item.title: Ye Olde Cursed Tower v1.0.1
item.description: An update to Ye Olde Cursed Tower to smooth out the jam jankiness and add more dialogue, as well as other minor features.

item.title: ATM Machine v2.0.2
item.description: An update to ATM Machine that makes the normal ATM text have a more robotic feel, as well as various other minor changes.

item.title: Function ChunkText
item.description: Release of a new function: ChunkText. This function takes a dialogue string and outputs it in chunks of 3 characters at a time, with various options to adjust it. It's intended to give text a more robotic feel.

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 announcement
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 will be happening soon! See the event's page for the rules and timeframe.

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has begun
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has begun!

item.title: Leaky Pipe v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Leaky Pipe. A pipe that sticks to the top of the screen and drops down liquid occasionally!

item.title: Stratospheric Delivery v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Stratospheric Delivery. A free-floating cloud with dressups for rain in various colors, and different colors of cloud!

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has ended
item.description: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 has ended! There is a 1 hour grace period to finish submissions before the form closes.

item.title: Stock Pot v1.0.0
item.description: Release of a new Hydrate shell, Stock Pot. A stock pot with dressups for a lid and steam!

item.title: 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam afterword
item.description: The results of 8/20 Hydrate Shell Jam 2025 are here! A few thoughts after tying up the event.

item.title: Aughost 2025 afterword
item.description: Aughost 2025 has ended! Some brief commentary at the end of the event.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.0
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, kicking off a long-overdue overhaul. This update includes deprecation of some old functions.

item.title: Hydrate v2.0.1
item.description: A major update to Hydrate has been released, with some breaking changes to the stat share event that was introduced in the previous update, as well as new features and bug fixes.

item.title: FormatLinks updated
item.description: An update to the function FormatLinks, cleaning up the code and making it not rely on compatible.dic.
